title: Who are some famous musicians that started playing late? - Quora

response.answer_text: Michael Fitzpatrick Fitz and the Tantrums released their first album in 2008, when lead singer Michael Fitzpatrick was 38. He worked as a sound engineer for years but only started taking piano lessons at 32: “ "I'd always been a decent singer, but I got frustrated by my inability to play piano by anything more than by ear. I took piano lessons when I was 32, and it opened up a whole new vocabulary for me."
